channel.title: [Challenge] Devil's swapper
channel.description:
Your weekend challenge is here!
This is a simple challenge. Do not look for very sophisticated stuff. You know... the devil's in the details.
[poll type=regular] * Boring to death * Easy * Interesting * WTF [/poll]
#Objective You have to find the secret key and the secret message. That's it
Extra points for solving the challenge using standard tools!
#Hints There is a hint in the binary itself. Other than that:
Hint 1:[spoiler]Use the basic tools first to get extra information, and look for _strange_ things[/spoiler] Hint 2:[spoiler]Fine... by now you should be able to recognize ROT13 text[/spoiler] Hint 3:[spoiler]Maybe there is some obfuscated code somewhere[/spoiler]
# Binary
You can generate the binary from the dump below using the following command:
cat textfile | base64 -d | gunzip > challenge && chmod +x challenge
Good luck!

OK guys… you almost have the solution. Thanks to all of you for trying this challenge!

So this is another hint

I will wait one or two days more before publishing the solution. In the meantime you can also try (Late Easter Challenge)… I know @_py has solved it but we haven’t published a solution yet so… hack fun

item.title: [Challenge] Devil's swapper
item.dc:creator: 0x00pf
item.description:
Your weekend challenge is here!

This is a simple challenge. Do not look for very sophisticated stuff. You know… the devil’s in the details.

Click to view the poll.

#Objective
You have to find the secret key and the secret message. That’s it

Extra points for solving the challenge using standard tools!

#Hints
There is a hint in the binary itself. Other than that:

Hint 1:spoiler
Hint 2:spoiler
Hint 3:spoiler

Binary

You can generate the binary from the dump below using the following command:

cat textfile | base64 -d | gunzip > challenge && chmod +x challenge

Good luck!
